title: [Self-Directed] Learning Analytics Strategies to Enhance MOOC Learning Experiences

context.prior_knowledge: Basic MOOC platform usage, online learning experience
context.additional_context: Utilizing smartphone-based learning analytics tools, emphasizing small-group activities and individualized feedback.

learning_goals: Learners can interpret learning analytics data to propose directions for improving MOOC design.
Learners can design personalized learning strategies based on learner types (systematic sequential/interactive exploratory).
Learners can utilize a simple analytical tool to track participation in mobile learning environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
